author: Scott Galloway
title: Four Tech Giants Are Solidifying Their Domination of the Post-Coronavirus World - New York Magazine
description: Scott Galloway examines the staggering gains anticipated at Google, Facebook, Apple, and Amazon during the historic economic downturn.
content:
The only investment strategy, portfolio, or retirement planning any person needs is the following: Buy the stocks of firms that are unregulated monopolies and nothing else. Ive followed this dictum for a decade, and its worked.
Over the last decade, Amazon, … [+6953 chars]
